member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Awake
member.summary: Unity lifecycle method that initializes TestVanDammeAnim. Sets up sprite systems, parachute functionality, collision layers, materials, and core physics components required for character operation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddBoxCollider
member.summary: Adds or configures a BoxCollider component with character-specific collision dimensions. Sets different box sizes and centers for various enemy types (Xenomorph, FaceHugger, etc.) with default humanoid dimensions as fallback.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddRigidbody
member.summary: Adds or configures a Rigidbody component for physics simulation. Sets the rigidbody to kinematic mode with gravity disabled for manual physics control.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetDefaultGroundLayer
member.summary: Sets up the default ground collision layer mask including Ground, LargeObjects, and IndestructibleGround layers for ground detection and collision checking.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetStrictGroundLayer
member.summary: Sets up a strict ground collision layer mask including only Ground and IndestructibleGround layers, excluding LargeObjects for more restrictive ground detection.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RegisterUnit
member.summary: Registers this unit with the Map system for game tracking and management.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Start
member.summary: Unity lifecycle method that handles game mode-specific initialization. Configures special ammo based on game mode (deathmatch, procedural generation, campaign), sets up sound system, avatar states, and initial invulnerability.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetDeltaTime
member.summary: Updates the frame delta time with clamping to prevent large time steps. Stores previous frame time and clamps current time to maximum of 0.0334 seconds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetHighFiveBoostDeltaTime
member.summary: Sets modified delta time during high-five boost effects. Applies different time multipliers based on time scale and special boost conditions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.LateUpdate
member.summary: Unity lifecycle method for post-frame updates. Handles input bit preservation, inseminator unit synchronization, map disable area extension, and quicksand checking.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.FixedUpdate
member.summary: Unity fixed update method that runs oil test checking at fixed intervals.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Update
member.summary: Core Unity lifecycle method that executes the main update loop for TestVanDammeAnim each frame. Processes essential character systems in this execution order: 1. **Acid coverage effects** - Visual and damage processing for acid-covered characters 2. **Delta time management** - Frame timing with high-five boost support 3. **Input processing** - Handle player input or trigger action control 4. **Status effect timers** - Stun, freeze, zombie revival, and death counters 5. **Animation frame management** - Sprite frame advancement and timing 6. **Movement calculation and execution** - Core physics and movement processing 7. **Special movement states** - Impaled, strung-up, or platform movement 8. **Combat systems** - Weapon management, firing, and melee processing 9. **Hero-specific systems** - Checkpoints, rescues, enemy alerting, item pickup 10. **Invulnerability management** - Temporary invincibility and revival timing 11. **Alien infection system** - Insemination mechanics and chest-bursting 12. **Environmental effects** - Ducking, grass interaction, boundary checks 13. **Audio and visual effects** - Wall dragging sounds, trails, freeze shaders 14. **Player management** - Kick system and recall mechanics 15. **Parachute system** - Deployment timing and physics modification This method coordinates all core character functionality and represents the main execution loop for character behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetUpHero(System.Int32,HeroType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures TestVanDammeAnim as a hero character with specified player number and hero type. Optionally registers with HeroController and creates hero indicator effects based on game state conditions.
member.param: The player number to assign to this hero (0-3)
The type of hero this character represents
Whether to register this hero with the HeroController system

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AttachToHeli
member.summary: Virtual method for attaching TestVanDammeAnim to helicopter. Currently empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ShowStartBubble
member.summary: Displays the starting bubble UI for heroes when HUDs are enabled and character is alive. Restarts bubble animation and flashes avatar.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetPositionAndVelocity(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the position and velocity of TestVanDammeAnim with teleportation handling. If the distance change exceeds 6 units, directly sets position to prevent large jumps.
member.param: New X coordinate position
New Y coordinate position
X velocity component
Y velocity component

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseAttackJumpForceForSeconds(System.Single)
member.summary: Temporarily increases jump force to attack jump force for a specified duration. Stores original jump force for restoration.
member.param: Duration in seconds to use the enhanced jump force

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ResetToOriginalJumpForce
member.summary: Restores the original jump force and clears the attack jump force timer if previously modified.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AttachToZipline(ZipLine)
member.summary: Attaches character to zipline for transportation. Sets zipline state and disables normal movement controls.
member.param: ZipLine object to attach to

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopDashing
member.summary: Manages dash speed multiplier cleanup when ending dash sequences. Resets dash speed to 1.0 for grounded characters while preserving last dash speed for airborne characters to maintain momentum.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanAirDash(DirectionEnum)
member.summary: Determines if character can perform air dash in specified direction based on character state and directional availability. Returns true if character can air dash or is on ground, false if dead, acid-covered, or direction unavailable.
member.param: Direction to check for air dash availability (Up, Down, Left, Right)
member.returns: True if air dash is possible in the specified direction, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateMovement
member.summary: Core movement calculation method that processes all character input and physics. Handles wind effects, sandstorm damage, firing input, dash detection, directional movement with double-tap dash triggers, air dashes during high-five holds, action state transitions, edge slip prevention, down input processing with parachute deactivation, and comprehensive jump mechanics including wall jumps, quicksand jumps, wall climbing initiation, and air jump grace periods.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanJumpOffGround
member.summary: Determines if character can jump from current ground position by checking for solid ground contact with wall collision considerations. Accounts for directional movement restrictions and quicksand movement penalties.
member.returns: True if character can jump from current position, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetActionstateToIdle
member.summary: Sets the character's action state to idle. Simple state transition method that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DontSlipOverEdges
member.summary: Prevents heroes from accidentally falling off edges by detecting ground ahead and stopping movement. Uses raycast detection based on facing direction to check for ground at feet width distance, stopping rolling and zeroing velocity when edge detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanBeAffectedByWind
member.summary: Determines if character can be affected by wind effects. Returns false during chimney flip to prevent wind interference with the maneuver.
member.returns: True if character can be affected by wind, false during chimney flip

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PressDown
member.summary: Handles down button press input by recording the tap time for potential down-based actions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.NotPressingJump
member.summary: Processes jump button release by disabling wall climbing state when jump is not being pressed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ClampSpeedPressingLeft
member.summary: Clamps horizontal velocity to -10 when pressing left without simultaneous right input to ensure responsive leftward movement initiation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ClampSpeedPressingRight
member.summary: Clamps horizontal velocity to 10 when pressing right without simultaneous left input to ensure responsive rightward movement initiation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HitRightWall
member.summary: Virtual method called when character collides with right wall. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes for wall collision handling.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HitLeftWall
member.summary: Virtual method called when character collides with left wall. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes for wall collision handling.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Tumble
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for tumble mechanics. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement tumbling behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Jump(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handles all jump mechanics including wall jumps, grace jumping, and special surface interactions. Adjusts jump force based on surface type (barbed wire reduces to 80%, bouncy blocks increase to 190%) and inherits velocity from moving platforms.
member.param: If true, performs a wall jump with horizontal velocity reset and climb sound/animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirJump
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for air jump/double jump mechanics. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement air jumping behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddSpeedLeft
member.summary: Accelerates the character leftward with speed limits and multipliers based on movement state. Base acceleration is 2x, dashing provides 4x, and parachute reduces speed by 50%. Includes an extra 2.6x boost when below maximum speed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddSpeedRight
member.summary: Accelerates the character rightward with speed limits and multipliers based on movement state. Base acceleration is 2x, dashing provides 4x, and parachute reduces speed by 50%. Includes an extra 2.6x boost when below maximum speed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsOnGround
member.summary: Determines if the character is standing on ground by checking if Y position is within 0.5 units above ground height and vertical velocity is not positive.
member.returns: True if the character is on ground, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsNearGround(System.Single)
member.summary: Checks if the character is within a specified distance from the ground.
member.param: Maximum distance above ground to consider "near".
member.returns: True if the character's Y position is below ground height plus the offset.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanTouchGround(System.Single)
member.summary: Checks if the character can touch ground using multiple raycasts at different positions. Performs up to 4 raycasts for regular ground and 4 additional raycasts for ladders if applicable.
member.param: Horizontal offset for additional raycast checks.
member.returns: True if any raycast hits ground or ladder, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetGroundLayer
member.summary: Returns the appropriate layer mask for ground detection based on whether the player is holding down. When not holding down, includes platforms; when holding down, excludes platforms to allow dropping through.
member.returns: LayerMask combining ground, fragile, and optionally platform layers.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetGroundHeightGround
member.summary: Calculates the ground height below the character using box casts and raycasts. Checks for both regular ground and ladders, updating ground references and footstep sound types based on what is detected.
member.returns: The highest ground point found, or -200f if no ground is detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateGroundHeight
member.summary: Updates the ground height for the character by calling GetGroundHeightGround to perform ground detection calculations.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunMovement
member.summary: Central movement processing hub that orchestrates all character movement based on action state. Handles dead state physics with quicksand damping, ladder and zipline mechanics, jump timing and gravity application, water physics damping, comprehensive collision detection for walls/ceilings/floors, out-of-bounds death triggers, and frame-based movement calculations. This is the core method that drives all character physics and movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsOilyBelow
member.summary: Detects if there are oily surfaces beneath the character using two raycasts from foot positions. Checks 9 units down from Y+4 position with foot spread of 4 units.
member.returns: True if either foot position detects an oily block below.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGroundBelow
member.summary: Simple ground detection with fixed 5-unit range using two raycasts from left and right foot positions.
member.returns: True if either foot detects ground within 5 units below.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGroundBelow(System.Single)
member.summary: Parameterized ground detection with variable range using two raycasts from foot positions.
member.param: Maximum distance to check for ground below the character.
member.returns: True if either foot detects ground within the specified distance.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGroundBelowAtXOffset(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ground detection at a specific horizontal offset from the character position, useful for checking ground ahead or behind.
member.param: Horizontal offset from character position to check.
Whether to include ladder detection in addition to ground.
member.returns: True if ground (and optionally ladders) detected at the offset position.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunGroundFriction
member.summary: Applies friction when character is on ground and idle. Normal friction rapidly decelerates at 25x rate, while rolling friction is slower at 5x rate.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunAirFriction
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for air friction. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement air resistance.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunDeadGravity
member.summary: Applies physics when character is dead. In air: applies gravity or quicksand gravity unless impaled, triggers falling animation at -50 velocity. On ground: applies friction using 10x friction multiplier.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.EvaluateIsJumping
member.summary: Determines if the character should be in a jumping state by checking if they are more than 0.1 units above the ground. Only evaluates when ground height is valid (not -100000).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetActionStateToJumping(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes the character's action state to jumping with health validation. Normal mode requires positive health and not already jumping. Updates animation frame unless using special ability.
member.param: If true, bypasses the check for already being in jump state (but still requires health > 0).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunFalling
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for falling state behavior. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement custom falling logic.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunFallen
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for post-fall state behavior. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement custom fallen state logic.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunCheckHanging
member.summary: Detects if character can hang from ceiling using upward raycasts. Requires 0.8 seconds after jump, appropriate directional conditions, and ceiling detection within range. Sets vertical velocity based on ceiling distance and tracks interactive ceiling objects.
member.returns: True if hanging conditions are met and ceiling is detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunHanging
member.summary: Manages movement and physics while hanging from ceiling. Provides slight upward movement with up/jump input, applies horizontal speed clamping based on animation frame, increases friction when not moving, and continuously checks for ceiling presence. Automatically stops hanging when ceiling is lost or down is pressed.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.jumpForce
member.summary: Gets or sets the force applied when the character jumps. This value can be temporarily modified for special attack jumps.
member.value: The upward force in physics units applied during jump actions.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsStandingStill
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is completely stationary. Returns true when the character is on the ground and both X and Y velocities are below 0.5.
member.value: true if the character is on ground and not moving; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.GetSpeed
member.summary: Gets the effective movement speed considering all active modifiers and environmental effects. Speed is reduced by 50% when surrounded by barbed wire.
member.value: The calculated movement speed including ValueOrchestrator modifiers and environmental penalties.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.XY
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's position as a Vector2. This override provides network synchronization hooks for the base class position property.
member.value: The character's X and Y coordinates in world space.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TempInvulnerability(System.Single)
member.summary: Grants temporary invulnerability to TestVanDammeAnim for a specified duration. Sets invulnerable state and resets fired-while-invulnerable tracking.
member.param: Duration of invulnerability in seconds. If 0 or negative, uses default duration of 1.2 times the current frame delta time (very brief)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateSkeleton
member.summary: Creates appropriate skeleton prefab based on character type (BigGuy, HellLostSoul, Grenadier, etc.) for death/melting animations. Only creates if skeleton doesn't already exist.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Melt
member.summary: Initiates melting animation sequence using character-specific melting prefabs. Sets melted state and creates appropriate melting effects for different enemy types and states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckNotifyDeathType
member.summary: Checks if enough time has passed since death to notify death type. Calls NotifyDeathType after 0.33 second delay.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopBeingStunned
member.summary: Virtual method for ending stun effects. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AlertNearbyMooks
member.summary: Alerts nearby enemy units to player presence within 8x8 unit area. Updates last alert time for tracking alert frequency.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckFacingDirection
member.summary: Manages character facing direction based on movement, input, and special abilities. Prevents direction changes during chimney flips, air dashes, or when configured to maintain special facing direction.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckDestroyed
member.summary: Handles character destruction cleanup. Removes from map tracking, reduces lives if applicable, and triggers unit destruction.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DestroyUnit
member.summary: Virtual method that destroys the game object. Can be overridden by derived classes for custom destruction behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Boost(System.Single)
member.summary: Applies temporary speed boost effect for specified duration.
member.param: Duration of boost effect in seconds

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TimeBroBoost(System.Single)
member.summary: Applies time-based character boost effect for specified duration.
member.param: Duration of time boost effect in seconds

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.invulnerableTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the remaining invulnerability duration in seconds. When greater than zero, the character cannot take damage.
member.value: The duration in seconds the character remains invulnerable to damage.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsDucking
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is currently in a ducking or crouching state.
member.value: true if the character is ducking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsFrozen
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is currently frozen by freeze effects.
member.value: true if the character has remaining freeze time; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.WillReviveAlready
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this unit will be automatically revived. This base implementation always returns false.
member.value: Always false for TestVanDammeAnim. Derived classes can override to implement revival mechanics.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsPerformanceEnhanced
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether performance enhancement effects are currently active. This base implementation always returns false.
member.value: Always false for TestVanDammeAnim. Derived classes can override to implement performance boost mechanics.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.counter
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation frame timing counter. This counter accumulates delta time and triggers the next animation frame when it exceeds the frameRate threshold (0.0334 seconds).
member.value: The accumulated time in seconds since the last animation frame change. Resets after triggering the next frame.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledByTransform
member.summary: Gets or sets the Transform that is currently impaling this unit. Setting this property also updates the related Impaler component reference.
member.value: The Transform of the object impaling this unit, or null if not impaled.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsParachuteActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parachute is currently active. Setting this property manages parachute GameObject visibility, physics effects, and landing invulnerability.
member.value: true if the parachute is deployed and active; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForCheckPoints
member.summary: Checks if character is touching checkpoints at current position or slightly above ground level. Calls ReachedCheckPoint if checkpoint contact is detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReachedCheckPoint
member.summary: Virtual method called when character reaches a checkpoint. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunZombieEffects
member.summary: Handles ongoing zombie revival visual effects. Creates periodic zombie passive effects with random timing intervals.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PickupPickupables
member.summary: Attracts nearby pickupable items when character is alive. Uses attraction radius to automatically collect items within range.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckRescues
member.summary: Checks for nearby heroes to rescue and grants rescue bonuses. Provides invulnerability, shows start bubble, and adds brutality grace period.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunBlindStars
member.summary: Creates periodic blind star visual effects around blinded characters. Spawns shrapnel stars above character head with randomized positioning.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForTraps(System.Single)
member.summary: Comprehensive trap detection system. Checks for acid pools, barbed wire, spikes, and mines. Handles impalement, damage, and movement constraints from environmental hazards.
member.param: Y velocity reference that may be modified by trap interactions

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsSurroundedByBarbedWire
member.summary: Checks if character is surrounded by barbed wire that can cause damage during movement.
member.returns: True if surrounded by damaging barbed wire, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunHasLeftOilTest
member.summary: Manages gradual oil level decay and material transitions when leaving oil areas. Decreases oil level over time using deltaTime, updates material opacity properties, and handles cleanup by restoring original materials when oil level reaches zero.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.LandInOil
member.summary: Initializes oil effect materials and applies them to both character and gun sprites. Creates oily materials using "Unlit/Depth Cutout With Image - Oily" shader with lazy instantiation pattern. Sets up UV2 coordinates and configures sprite size vectors for proper oil effect rendering.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.LeaveOil
member.summary: Placeholder method for leaving oil areas. Actual oil cleanup logic is handled by the continuous RunHasLeftOilTest method which manages gradual oil level decay and material restoration.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsSubmergedInPool
member.summary: Extended submersion detection that treats quicksand and oil as equivalent to pool submersion. Overrides base class functionality by combining base pool detection with quicksand and oil state checks using logical OR operation.
member.returns: True if character is submerged in pool, quicksand, or oil; false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForQuicksand
member.summary: Manages quicksand detection and transition effects. Tracks quicksand state changes, creates appropriate splash and particle effects on entry/exit, plays surface-specific sounds, and disables blast velocity while in quicksand.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForQuicksandDeath
member.summary: Monitors for lethal quicksand submersion and applies crush damage after 2-second delay. Checks if character is deep in quicksand (16 units below surface) and deals fatal damage if choke counter exceeds threshold.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.WallDrag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the character is sliding down a wall. Setting this property manages wall drag audio effects, knife climbing state, and parachute deactivation.
member.value: true if the character is sliding down a wall; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.WallClimbing
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is currently climbing a wall.
member.value: true if the character is wall climbing; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunOnlineBadSpawnFailSafe
member.summary: Prevents bad spawn situations in online multiplayer for hero characters. Runs periodic checks to ensure proper spawn state when not hosting.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetGunPosition(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Positions the gun sprite relative to the character with specified offsets. Sets gun transform position and ensures consistent scale (1,1,1) while maintaining proper rendering depth (-0.001f on Z-axis).
member.param: Horizontal offset for gun positioning relative to character
Vertical offset for gun positioning relative to character

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetFootPoofColor
member.summary: Determines appropriate particle effect color based on environmental ground conditions. Uses priority-based detection: oil takes precedence over quicksand, which takes precedence over pool submersion. Returns BloodColor.None for normal ground.
member.returns: BloodColor enum value representing the appropriate particle effect color for current environment

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.HalfWidth
member.summary: Gets the half-width of the character's collision bounds. This value is used for collision detection and positioning calculations.
member.value: Half the width of the character's collision box in world units.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.SyncParent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent Transform for network synchronization. This property enables synchronized parenting across multiplayer clients.
member.value: The Transform that should be synchronized as this object's parent across the network.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.SyncParentedPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position relative to a parent Transform for network synchronization. This property manages both position and parent relationship in multiplayer scenarios.
member.value: A ParentedPosition structure containing position data and parent transform reference.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckHighFive
member.summary: Checks for nearby characters available for high-five interactions and manages high-five initiation timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TryConnectHighFive
member.summary: Attempts to connect with nearby character for high-five interaction. Returns success status for networking.
member.returns: True if high-five connection successful, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HighFiveBoost(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Applies high-five boost effects including speed enhancement and visual effects.
member.param: Whether this character initiated the high-five

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateHighFiveEffects
member.summary: Creates visual and audio effects for successful high-five interactions including particles and screen effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanInseminate(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Checks if character can be inseminated by alien face huggers. Requires no existing inseminator, positive health, and health below 1000.
member.param: X force component (unused in logic)
Y force component (unused in logic)
member.returns: True if character can be inseminated, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HasFaceHugger
member.summary: Checks if character currently has a face hugger attached.
member.returns: True if face hugger is attached, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsInseminated
member.summary: Checks if character is currently in inseminated state with active alien infection.
member.returns: True if inseminated with alien parasite, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateInseminationFrame
member.summary: Calculates the sprite frame for insemination animation based on infection progression. Returns frames 0-7 based on inseminated counter timing.
member.returns: Animation frame index for insemination state

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DisConnectFaceHugger
member.summary: Removes attached face hugger from character. Handles face hugger positioning, disconnection, and UI cleanup.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Inseminate(AlienFaceHugger,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Initiates alien insemination process via RPC for network synchronization. Called by face hugger units to begin infection.
member.param: The alien face hugger performing the insemination
X force component for insemination
Y force component for insemination
member.returns: Always returns true

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.InseminateRPC(AlienFaceHugger,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: RPC method that executes alien insemination process. Sets up face hugger attachment, initializes infection counters, updates UI, and plays muffled scream sounds.
member.param: The alien face hugger performing insemination
X force component for insemination
Y force component for insemination

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RecoverFromInsemination
member.summary: Initiates recovery from alien insemination via RPC for network synchronization. Called to cure infection before chest bursting occurs.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RecoverFromInseminatioRPC
member.summary: RPC method that executes insemination recovery. Removes face hugger, resets infection counters, grants invulnerability, and cleans up UI elements.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.BurstChest
member.summary: Executes alien chest bursting sequence. Disconnects face hugger, spawns alien xenomorph (only for local player or local insemination), targets nearest player, triggers alien growth, gibs character, and plays sound effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayKnifeClimbSound
member.summary: Plays knife climbing sound effects with automatic variation cycling. Increments sound counter and uses modulo operation to cycle through available knife wall sounds. Plays at 0.2f volume and 1f pitch with 3D positioning.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayFootStepSound(UnityEngine.AudioClip[],System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Core footstep sound playing method with player versus NPC audio optimization. Players hear full volume while NPCs play at 50% volume and only when visible on screen. Includes footstep delay gating to prevent audio spam.
member.param: Array of audio clips to randomly select from for footstep sound
Volume level for the footstep sound
Pitch level for the footstep sound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayLandSound
member.summary: Plays appropriate landing sound based on current ground surface type. Supports six surface types (Dirt, Stone, Metal, Wood, Grass, Slime) with corresponding sound arrays. All landing sounds play at 0.6f volume and 1f pitch.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayJumpSound
member.summary: Plays appropriate jumping sound based on current ground surface type. Uses identical surface detection logic as landing sounds but with jump-specific audio variants. Plays at slightly higher volume (0.65f) compared to landing sounds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayExitLadderSound
member.summary: Plays sound effect for exiting a ladder (reuses jump sound).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayClimbSound
member.summary: Plays sound effect for general climbing actions (reuses jump sound).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunWallDraggingAudio
member.summary: Manages wall dragging audio effects for heroes with wall climb ability. Adjusts pitch and volume based on climbing state and vertical velocity.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayChestBurstSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays alien chest burst sound effect at character position with specified pitch.
member.param: Pitch modifier for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlaySpecial2Sound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays special ability 2 sound effect with specified pitch. Default overload that calls the volume/pitch variant.
member.param: Pitch modifier for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlaySpecial2Sound(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays special ability 2 sound effect with custom volume and pitch settings.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect
Pitch modifier for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayThrowLightSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays light throwing sound effect for objects like grenades or light weapons.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayThrowHeavySound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays heavy throwing sound effect for objects like heavy weapons or large items.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayPushBlockSound
member.summary: Virtual method for playing block pushing sound. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlaySpecialAttackSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays special attack sound effect with specified volume.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.summary: Plays special ability 3 sound effect with specified volume and default pitch.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect
member.returns: AudioSource component playing the sound

Pitch modifier for the sound effect
member.returns: AudioSource component playing the sound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayDashSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays dashing movement sound effect with specified volume.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.summary: Plays chimney flip sound effect by calling the dash sound method.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlaySpecialSound
member.summary: Plays special ability sound effect with default volume (0.8) and pitch (1.0).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlaySpecialSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays special ability sound effect with specified volume and default pitch.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlaySpecialSound(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays special ability sound effect with full control over volume, pitch, and reverb settings.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect
Pitch modifier for the sound effect
Whether to bypass environmental reverb effects

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlaySpecialSound(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays special ability sound effect with specified volume and pitch.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect
Pitch modifier for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayPowerUpSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays power-up sound effect with specified volume and default pitch.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayYeahSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays celebration "yeah" sound effect with specified volume. Delegates to power-up sound system.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayYeahSound(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays celebration "yeah" sound effect with full control over volume, pitch, and reverb. Delegates to power-up sound system.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect
Pitch modifier for the sound effect
Whether to bypass environmental reverb effects

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayFlexSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Virtual method for playing flex sound. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect (note: parameter name has typo)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayPowerUpSound(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays power-up sound effect with specified volume and pitch settings.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect
Pitch modifier for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayPanicSound
member.summary: Plays panic sound effect with randomized pitch variation for distressed character states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayFreezeScreamSound
member.summary: Plays freeze scream sound effect with randomized pitch variation when character is frozen.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayStunnedSound
member.summary: Plays stunned sound effect by calling the dizzy sound method with default parameters.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayDizzieSound(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays dizzy/stunned sound effect with pitch randomization in 0.05 range plus character-specific pitch shift for natural variation.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect (default 0.33)
Base pitch value with 0.05 random variation applied (default 1.0)
member.returns: AudioSource component playing the sound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayMuffledScreamsSound
member.summary: Plays muffled screams sound effect typically used during alien face hugger attacks.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayGreetingSound
member.summary: Plays greeting sound effect for character interactions and high-five initiations.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanLaugh
member.summary: Checks if character can play laughter sounds based on available sound assets.
member.returns: True if laugh sounds are available, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayLaughterSound
member.summary: Plays laughter sound effect with 2-second cooldown to prevent spam. Used for character celebration and reactions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayResurrectionSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays resurrection sound effect with 2-second cooldown when character is revived or respawns.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect (default 0.3)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAttack2Sound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays secondary attack sound effect for special combat actions.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect (default 0.35)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAttack3Sound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays tertiary attack sound effect for advanced combat actions.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect (default 1.0)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAttack4Sound(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays quaternary attack sound effect with custom volume and pitch settings.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect (default 1.0)
Base pitch modifier (default 0.9)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayConfusedSound
member.summary: Plays confused sound effect for disoriented character states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayChokeSound
member.summary: Plays choking sound effect with randomized pitch variation for suffocation or strangulation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAttractedSound
member.summary: Plays attraction sound effect when character is attracted to or influenced by external forces.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayHighFiveSound
member.summary: Plays high-five celebration sound with 0.3 second cooldown to prevent spam.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayBassDropSoundSound
member.summary: Plays bass drop sound effect for dramatic moments with 0.3 second cooldown.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayBassDropShortSound
member.summary: Plays shortened bass drop sound effect with higher volume and 0.3 second cooldown.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAttackSound
member.summary: Plays primary attack sound effect with default volume (0.3).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAttackSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays primary attack sound effect with specified volume.
member.param: Volume level for the sound effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetCurrentFootstepSound(UnityEngine.Collider)
member.summary: Updates the current footstep sound type based on the ground collider's tag, but only if a footstep sound holder exists and the collider has a tag other than "Untagged".
member.param: The ground collider the character is touching.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.ShowGesturesMenu
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the gestures menu should be displayed. Always false because the Gestures Menu is unimplemented.
member.value: Always false

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartPilotingUnit(Unit)
member.summary: Initiates piloting mode by disabling character rendering and controls while transferring control to specified unit. Sets health to 10000, enables invulnerability, and stops UI bubbles.
member.param: The unit this character will pilot

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetPilottedUnit
member.summary: Gets the unit currently being piloted by this character.
member.returns: The piloted unit, or null if not piloting anything

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DischargePilotingUnit(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exits piloting mode and restores character to normal state. Re-enables rendering, restores health, sets position/velocity, and optionally applies stun effects.
member.param: X position to place character after discharge
Y position to place character after discharge
X velocity to apply after discharge
Y velocity to apply after discharge
Whether to stun the character after discharge

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.playerBubble
member.summary: Gets the ReactionBubble instance appropriate for this player's number. Returns the corresponding bubble UI element based on the player's assigned number.
member.value: The ReactionBubble UI component associated with this player's number.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetSpriteOffset(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets sprite rendering offset for visual positioning adjustments during animations.
member.param: X coordinate offset for sprite positioning
Y coordinate offset for sprite positioning

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateMelee
member.summary: Virtual method for melee attack animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateThrowingHeldObject
member.summary: Handles animation for throwing held objects like grenades or mooks. Sets throwing state and manages object release timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial
member.summary: Handles special ability animation sequences. Manages timing, facing direction, and animation state for special moves.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimatePockettedSpecial
member.summary: Executes pocketed special ability animation sequence. Manages 10-frame animation cycle, triggers ability execution at frame 4, and handles gun deactivation/reactivation throughout the sequence.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial2
member.summary: Virtual method for secondary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial3
member.summary: Virtual method for tertiary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial4
member.summary: Virtual method for quaternary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHighFiveHold
member.summary: Handles animation for holding high-five gesture with proper timing and visual feedback.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHighFiveRelease
member.summary: Handles animation for releasing/completing high-five gesture with celebration effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHanging
member.summary: Handles hanging animation from ledges or ceilings with proper sprite positioning and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateAirdash
member.summary: Handles horizontal air dash animation with direction-based sprite selection and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateAirdashDown
member.summary: Handles downward air dash animation with specific sprite frames and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateJumping
member.summary: Handles jumping animation sequences including takeoff, flight, and landing preparation phases.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualJumpingDuckingFrames
member.summary: Handles specific jumping animation frames when character is in ducking state during jump.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateLedgeGrapple
member.summary: Handles ledge grappling animation with grabbing and climbing motion sequences.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateZipline
member.summary: Handles zipline traversal animation with movement-based sprite selection and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateChimneyFlip
member.summary: Handles chimney flip animation sequence for wall-to-wall traversal between narrow spaces.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateStrungUpFrames
member.summary: Sets the sprite animation frame for when the character is strung up or hanged. Displays a static death pose frame.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateOnBackOffUnit
member.summary: Sets the sprite frame for when the character is backing away from another unit.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualJumpingFrames
member.summary: Manages complex jumping animation frames based on vertical and horizontal velocity. Supports three distinct velocity states: fast rising (yI > 20f), fast falling (yI < -55f), and normal jumping. Includes gun positioning and frame validation with different animations for varying movement speeds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateRolling
member.summary: Animates the rolling sequence using a countdown-based frame system. Sets frame rate to 0.025f, deactivates the gun during rolling, and plays landing sound at frame 7 of the sequence.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateImpaled
member.summary: Handles impalement animation with different frames for living versus dead characters. Living characters use a clamped frame range, while dead characters or aliens use a specific static frame. Deactivates gun and resets sprite offset during impalement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateImpaledByChainSaw
member.summary: Sets a specific animation frame for chainsaw impalement death. Deactivates the gun and resets sprite offset. Simpler than regular impalement animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateIdle
member.summary: Main idle animation dispatcher that routes to specific animations based on character state. Implements a priority hierarchy system that handles ducking versus standing states separately. Routes to appropriate sub-animations including melee, high-five, special abilities, rolling, gestures, and dancing based on current character flags.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualIdleFrames
member.summary: Provides the base standing idle animation when the character is not performing any special actions. Activates gun, sets frame rate to 0.0667f, and displays a static pose. Conditionally sets gun sprite based on firing state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualIdleDuckingFrames
member.summary: Provides the base ducking idle animation with adjusted gun positioning. Similar to standing idle but uses a different frame and positions gun at offset (2f, -1f) to accommodate the ducking pose.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateRunning
member.summary: Main running animation dispatcher with comprehensive state priority system. Handles throwable objects, melee, special abilities, pushing, and rolling states. For base running, generates environmental effects including foot particles and sounds. Adapts frame rate for quicksand environments.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualDuckingRunning
member.summary: Specialized ducking run animation that uses an 8-frame cycle with foot effects every 4 frames. Adjusts gun position to (2f, -1f) to accommodate ducking pose and includes submersion checks for particle effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualNewRunningFrames
member.summary: Running animation with environmental responsiveness. Adjusts frame rate based on quicksand (3x slower) and barbed wire (2x slower) conditions. Generates foot particle effects every 4 frames when not submerged and plays footstep sounds. Supports dash animation states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimatePushing
member.summary: Animates character pushing objects with specialized timing and gun orientation. Uses 3x slower frame rate than normal running, flips gun sprite horizontally (scale -1f on X-axis), and uses a specific sprite sheet row. Plays footstep sounds every 4 frames.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateFaderTrailInstance
member.summary: Creates a fading trail effect sprite at character's current position and rotation. Instantiates fader sprite prefab, matches character's scale and material properties, and configures sprite dimensions for trail visualization.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.Renderer
member.summary: Gets the MeshRenderer component attached to this GameObject. Uses lazy initialization to cache the component reference for performance.
member.value: The MeshRenderer component, cached after first access.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.material
member.summary: Gets or sets the shared material of the MeshRenderer. This property provides direct access to modify the character's visual appearance.
member.value: The shared Material used by the MeshRenderer component.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ResetSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Resets special ammunition to the original maximum amount and updates the HeroController with the new value.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Increases special ammunition by 1 if below maximum capacity and updates the HeroController with the new value.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Gets the current special ammunition count for this character.
member.returns: Current special ammunition amount

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsAmmoFull
member.summary: Checks if special ammunition is at maximum capacity compared to the original special ammo limit.
member.returns: True if ammunition is at maximum, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetSpecialAmmoRPC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets special ammunition amount via RPC for network synchronization and updates the HeroController.
member.param: Amount of special ammunition to set

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetHeldObjectPos(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Positions held objects (grenades/mooks) relative to character with specified offset coordinates.
member.param: X offset from character position
Y offset from character position

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseSpecial
member.summary: Uses special ability (grenade throwing). Consumes special ammo, spawns grenade projectile with position-based trajectory, or flashes ammo indicator if depleted.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UsePockettedSpecial
member.summary: Virtual method for using pocketed special abilities. Resets facing direction and can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetAirdashAvailable
member.summary: Resets all directional air dash availability flags to true, allowing the character to perform air dashes in all directions again.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashRight
member.summary: Initiates a rightward air dash with a two-phase execution: a charge-up delay followed by the actual dash. The dash grants brief invulnerability and enables downward dashing afterwards.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashLeft
member.summary: Initiates a leftward air dash with a two-phase execution: a charge-up delay followed by the actual dash. The dash grants brief invulnerability and enables downward dashing afterwards.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashUp
member.summary: Performs an instant upward air dash without charge-up delay, launching the character upward with 150% jump force for a shorter duration than horizontal dashes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashDown
member.summary: Initiates a downward slam air dash with an extended duration (5x normal), starting with a slight upward movement before transitioning to a powerful downward motion.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Airdash(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Main air dash input handler that checks directional inputs and availability, then calls the appropriate directional dash method. Processes dashes in priority order: Right, Left, Down, Up.
member.param: If true, allows horizontal dashes without requiring fresh directional input.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAirDashChargeUpSound
member.summary: Virtual method for playing the air dash charge-up sound effect. Empty in base class, intended for override in derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAidDashSound
member.summary: Virtual method for playing the air dash execution sound effect. Empty in base class, intended for override in derived classes. Note: Method name contains typo ("Aid" instead of "Air").

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunAirDashing
member.summary: Central air dash controller that manages dash execution based on direction. Delegates to specific directional dash methods, counts down dash timer, and clamps velocities to normal ranges when dash completes. Special handling for upward dashes limits velocity to 80% jump force.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunLeftAirDash
member.summary: Executes leftward air dash with two-phase implementation. Delay phase: stops vertical movement and adds slight rightward anticipation movement. Dash phase: triggers animation change, plays dash sound, creates rightward poof effect, and calls SetAirDashLeftSpeed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetAirDashLeftSpeed
member.summary: Sets velocity for leftward air dash execution. Zeroes vertical movement and sets horizontal velocity to -2.3x normal speed for fast leftward movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunRightAirDash
member.summary: Executes rightward air dash with two-phase implementation. Delay phase: stops vertical movement and adds slight leftward anticipation movement. Dash phase: triggers animation change, plays dash sound, creates leftward poof effect, and calls SetAirDashRightSpeed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetAirDashRightSpeed
member.summary: Sets velocity for rightward air dash execution. Zeroes vertical movement and sets horizontal velocity to 2.3x normal speed for fast rightward movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunUpwardDash
member.summary: Executes upward air dash immediately without delay phase. Resets jump timer, applies 150% jump force for strong upward boost, and zeroes horizontal movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunDownwardDash
member.summary: Executes downward slam dash with accelerating descent. Uses complex velocity calculation that accelerates downward movement, triggers sound and visual effects when reaching -50 velocity threshold, and clamps final velocity between 1.25x max fall speed and 300 units.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.SpecialAmmo
member.summary: Gets or sets the current special ammunition count. Setting this property synchronizes the value across all clients when the unit is owned by the local player.
member.value: The number of special ammunition units currently available.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseFire
member.summary: Executes primary weapon firing sequence. Cancels melee if active, calculates projectile trajectory, spawns projectile, plays attack sound, and disturbs wildlife.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.FireWeapon(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Fires weapon projectile at specified position and velocity. Sets gun animation frame, creates muzzle flash, spawns projectile, and triggers fire events.
member.param: X position for projectile spawn
Y position for projectile spawn
X velocity for projectile
Y velocity for projectile

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TriggerBroFireEvent
member.summary: Triggers perk system fire event for hero characters to activate fire-related perks and bonuses.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TriggerBroSpecialEvent
member.summary: Triggers perk system special ability event for hero characters to activate special-related perks and bonuses.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TriggerBroMeleeEvent
member.summary: Triggers perk system melee event for hero characters to activate melee-related perks and bonuses.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SpawnPrimaryProjectile(Projectile,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Spawns primary weapon projectile using the ProjectileController system with specified parameters.
member.param: Projectile prefab to spawn
X position for projectile spawn
Y position for projectile spawn
X velocity for projectile
Y velocity for projectile
member.returns: Spawned Projectile instance

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseHeldObject(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases currently held object (grenade or mook) with appropriate physics and networking. Handles both throwing and dropping scenarios.
member.param: Whether object is being thrown (true) or dropped (false)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetupThrownMookVelocity(System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Calculates output velocity for thrown mook objects. Sets X velocity to 210 units in facing direction plus 20% of current momentum, and Y velocity to 120 units upward plus 30% of current vertical momentum.
member.param: Output X velocity for thrown mook
Output Y velocity for thrown mook

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseGrenadeRPC(Grenade,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: RPC method for releasing grenades across network. Handles grenade physics and positioning.
member.param: Grenade object to release
X velocity for grenade
Y velocity for grenade
X position for grenade release
Y position for grenade release

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ThrowGrenade(Grenade,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Executes grenade throwing mechanics with specified position and velocity parameters.
member.param: Grenade object to throw
X velocity for grenade trajectory
Y velocity for grenade trajectory
X position for grenade release
Y position for grenade release

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseAlien(Mook,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: RPC method that handles alien release from chest bursting. Applies fire damage to spawned alien if specified.
member.param: The alien unit being released
X velocity for alien spawn
Y velocity for alien spawn
Whether the alien should be set on fire
Index of player that witnessed the spawn

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopFiring
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for stopping fire action. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement fire stopping behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartFiring
member.summary: Initiates firing with rate control. Sets the fire counter based on fire rate: uses fireRate value for fast firing (rate < 0.3f) or 0 for slower rates.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunMelee
member.summary: Executes melee attack behavior by delegating to RunKnifeMeleeMovement. Acts as the entry point for melee execution.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunKnifeMeleeMovement
member.summary: Handles movement physics during knife melee attacks with three distinct patterns. Old system applies simple gravity. Jumping melee applies falling gravity with speed clamping. Dashing melee uses frame-based movement: frames 0-1 stop movement, frames 2-3 dash horizontally (with target tracking if available), frames 4-5 reduce speed, frames 6+ apply only gravity. Quicksand disables horizontal movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CancelMelee
member.summary: Cleanly exits melee state and resets all melee-related variables. Clears all melee flags, removes target reference, and intelligently determines next action state based on current conditions (preserves ladder climbing, sets jumping if airborne, running if moving, or idle).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnyInput
member.summary: Checks if any input button is currently pressed (movement, fire, special, jump, or high-five).
member.returns: True if any input is detected, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetSprintValue
member.summary: Returns the current sprint state of the character.
member.returns: True if the character is sprinting, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckDashing
member.summary: Manages dash state based on player input and sprint status. For local players, detects dash button presses and releases. For remote players, creates visual and audio effects when dash state changes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PressDashButton
member.summary: Initiates dashing when the dash button is pressed, but only if the character is not already dashing and is moving left or right.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseDashButton
member.summary: Stops dashing when the dash button is released, calling StopDashing to handle dash end logic.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.InputBits
member.summary: Gets or sets the packed input states for network synchronization. This property packs 11 boolean input flags into a single short value for efficient network transmission.
member.value: A short value containing packed boolean input states for network synchronization.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Kick
member.summary: Initiates player kick process by sending RPC to all clients if character hasn't been kicked yet.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.KickRPC
member.summary: RPC method that executes the kick sequence. Shows kick bubble, starts kick routine, and marks character as kicked.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.KickRoutine
member.summary: Coroutine that handles the visual kick countdown sequence. Flashes kick bubble materials with decreasing intervals, then gibs character and creates explosion effects.
member.returns: IEnumerator for coroutine execution

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ShowKickBubble
member.summary: Creates and displays the kick player bubble UI above the character. Sets up bubble parenting and restarts bubble animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopKickBubble
member.summary: Stops the kick player bubble animation if it exists.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForKick
member.summary: Checks proximity to other players and handles kick interactions. Shows kick bubble when eligible, changes bubble material based on proximity, and executes kicks when conditions are met.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HasBeenCoveredInAcid
member.summary: Checks if TestVanDammeAnim is currently covered in acid.
member.returns: True if covered in acid, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RemoveAcid
member.summary: Removes acid coverage from TestVanDammeAnim by sending RPC to all clients if conditions are met.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RemoveAcidRPC
member.summary: RPC method that removes acid coverage. Restores default material, enables gun sprite, and creates slime particle effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CoverInAcid
member.summary: Covers TestVanDammeAnim in acid if not invulnerable and eligible. Sends RPC to all clients to apply acid coverage.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CoverInAcidRPC
member.summary: RPC method that applies acid coverage effects. Changes materials, handles alien-specific reactions, and initiates acid damage systems.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunCoveredInAcid
member.summary: Handles ongoing acid coverage effects including cage busting damage, checkpoint recovery, melting animations, and acid particle generation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayLongGrassSound(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays environment-specific footstep sounds for grass and blood surfaces with timing control. Checks for jiggle doodads on the current block to determine sound type, playing blood sounds at reduced volume for blood doodads or grass sounds for other doodads.
member.param: Whether to respect the grass delay timer to prevent audio spam. If false, plays sound immediately regardless of timer
member.returns: True if a sound was played, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayFootStepSound
member.summary: Plays surface-appropriate footstep sounds with default volume and pitch settings (0.4 volume, 1.0 pitch).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayFootStepSound(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays surface-specific footstep sounds based on current environment and character state. Automatically selects appropriate sound arrays for quicksand, ladder climbing, or ground surface types (Dirt, Stone, Metal, Wood, Grass, Slime). Also triggers long grass sound effects when applicable.
member.param: Volume level for the footstep sound
Pitch level for the footstep sound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IncreaseFrame
member.summary: Advances the main animation frame counter and insemination frame counter if face hugger is attached. This method synchronizes both animation systems to ensure proper frame progression during alien infection states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ForceChangeFrame
member.summary: Forces an immediate frame change by calling the ChangeFrame method. Provides public access to trigger frame updates outside of the normal animation cycle.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ChangeFrame
member.summary: Core animation frame dispatcher that routes to appropriate animation methods based on character state and action. Handles priority-based animation selection including frozen state, special unit states (on back, strung up, impaled), and action state-specific animations (idle, running, jumping, climbing, death). Also manages gun activation, sprite offsets, and frame counters for various animation systems.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateClimbingLadderTransition(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handles smooth transition animation between ladder climbing and normal movement states. Manages transition frame progression, frame rates, and sprite positioning during the 6-frame transition sequence.
member.param: True when transitioning into climbing mode, false when transitioning out of climbing mode

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateClimbingLadder
member.summary: Manages comprehensive ladder climbing animation with multiple movement states. Handles transition animations, idle climbing with gun positioning, movement-based climbing with footstep sounds, and specialized climbing animations for up/down movement. Includes proximity detection for ladder presence and appropriate animation fallbacks.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateWallDrag
member.summary: Handles wall sliding animation with knife-based climbing mechanics. Manages alternating knife hand positions, velocity-based frame selection, sound effects, and visual particle effects. Supports both new knife climbing frames and legacy animation systems.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateWallAnticipation
member.summary: Manages wall climb anticipation animation with precise knife positioning based on vertical movement. Calculates knife stab positioning relative to previous climb heights and alternates between left and right knife hands for realistic climbing animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateWallClimb
member.summary: Executes active wall climbing animation with realistic knife stab mechanics and height tracking. Manages velocity changes at specific animation frames, alternating knife hands, sound effects, and precise tracking of climbing progress relative to previous stab positions. Includes collision detection for wall interaction events.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunStepOnWalls
member.summary: Triggers step-on events for wall surfaces during climbing or dragging. Performs raycasting to detect wall colliders and sends step messages for interaction with climbable surfaces.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateFallen
member.summary: Virtual method for fallen state animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes to provide custom fallen animation behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateDeath
member.summary: Death animation dispatcher that selects appropriate death animation based on character state. Prioritizes insemination frames if infected, falling death animation if airborne and not impaled, or standard ground death animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualDeath
member.summary: Displays standard ground death animation frame and deactivates gun sprite. Used for normal death situations when character dies on solid ground.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateFallingDeath
member.summary: Displays falling death animation frame for characters dying while airborne. Provides different visual feedback compared to ground death.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateInseminationFrames
member.summary: Displays alien insemination animation frames based on infection progression. Uses calculated insemination frame index to show appropriate sprite frame from the insemination animation sheet.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGesturing
member.summary: Checks if character is currently performing any gesture animation by verifying the current gesture state is not None.
member.returns: True if character is performing a gesture, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetGestureAnimation(GestureElement.Gestures)
member.summary: Sets and manages gesture animation state with frame reset and multiplayer achievement tracking. Blocks movement during gesture animation and awards achievement when all 4 players perform gestures simultaneously.
member.param: The gesture type to animate (None, Salute, Wave, Point, Flex, Thrust, KneeDrop, Shhh)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateGesture
member.summary: Handles comprehensive gesture animation sequences including salute, wave, point, flex, thrust, knee drop, and shush gestures. Manages frame progression, timing, special effects (flex sounds and face hugger disconnection), and looping behavior for different gesture types.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TriggerFlexEvent
member.summary: Triggers perk system flex event for muscle flexing gestures. Activates associated perks and bonuses when character performs flex animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateDancingFrames
member.summary: Displays dancing animation sequence using configurable frame cycling. Deactivates gun and cycles through dancing frames from the specified sprite sheet position with consistent frame rate.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartDashing
member.summary: Initiates dashing movement with speed multipliers and visual effects. Manages dash availability based on air state, applies speed modifiers with diminishing returns for successive dashes, and creates appropriate dash effects. Handles both ground and air dash scenarios.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckAirDash
member.summary: Evaluates conditions for air dash availability and triggers dash if conditions are met. Checks for horizontal air dash availability, ground proximity for dash continuation, and downward air dash when moving straight down.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ApplyWallClimbingGravity
member.summary: Applies specialized gravity calculations during wall climbing and dragging states. Provides reduced gravity during active climbing phases and maintains upward velocity during certain animation frames to create realistic wall climbing physics.
